1.title: Welcome to the Clippers Dance Squad
1.plot: In the series premiere, a new creative director joins the Clippers and chooses twenty dancers to join the dance squad. One of the veteran dancers struggles to keep up with the new routines and learns her job may be on the line, while a brash rookie rubs her new teammates the wrong way.

2.title: Adventures of the Floss Nest
2.plot: Petra makes her choice for co-captain - and gets decidedly mixed reactions from the squad. Meanwhile, Hannah adjusts to her new surroundings in L.A., Blair questions her new crush's intentions and Savanna turns up the heat with a good friend.

3.title: Game On
3.plot: The new Clippers Dance Squad finally takes the court at Staples Center for a game, but Athena's actions and demeanor give Petra cause for concern and Kellie reveals some heartbreaking news.

4.title: Broken China
4.plot: Petra chooses ten dancers to take on the Clippers' trip to China, which creates some discord among the team. Hannah plans a trip to New Orleans with some of the women to see her ex-boyfriend Keagan. One of the dancers disobeys the rules in China and endangers her spot on the Squad.

5.title: Personal Foul
5.plot: Athena receives a mysterious text in China that troubles her. Back in LA, Hannah, Savanna and Blair confront Athena for the truth about China, and Petra makes a major decision.

6.title: Blair's Birthday Blues
6.plot: The Floss Nest is in a tizzy planning for Blair's upcoming surprise birthday party. After a turbulent meeting with her mom, Blair gets the birthday blues. Natalie reaches her breaking point and begins to look at her future beyond the squad.

7.title: L.A. Women
7.plot: Savanna attempts to transform Hannah into a typical LA girl, meanwhile Natalie breaks down over the stresses of the season. Blair's rocky relationship with her mother takes a turn for the worst.

8.title: Last Dance, Last Chance
8.plot: In the season finale, Natalie receives a final chance to prove herself out on the court. Hannah's ex-boyfriend pays a visit, throwing her into an emotional tailspin. The squad rallies behind Blair and her girl group for a major performance, but Athena threatens to steal the show.

imdb.plot outline: This docuseries goes inside the Los Angeles Clippers' squad to provide viewers with a look at what it takes to be a member of an elite dance team both on and off the court. The team is led by new creative director Petra Pope, who has previously worked for other NBA teams. Once Pope selects dancers for the team, the pressure is on for them to work hard so they can succeed in the big leagues as they try to balance their careers with family life amidst the glitz and glamour of Hollywood.
imdb.title: L.A. Clippers Dance Squad
